title: Primož Roglič Abandons Giro d’Italia after Stage 16 Crash
content:
Roglič climbs into team car after suffering latest in a series of crashes on Tuesday's rain-soaked mountain stage, will scramble for recovery for Tour de France.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Abandons Giro d’Italia after Stage 16 Crash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
